trends: There have been 10 other sightings in Coos Bay
There were no other sightings in Coos Bay on or around December 3rd 2010
Summary: Very large black triangle flies over apartment.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was outside looking at the stars at 6:50 pm when I saw another large, black triangle traveling southeast from over my apartment. This one was higher up and as large as a 747! It had dimmed lights with the same number of seven. I will be mailing a picture of this also. I saw a smaller one on November 2nd 2010 with my daughter that traveled directly over us and just over our apartment. It was heading south. I'm getting a little worried...
